song.title: Canyon Flyin' Blues
song.info: MAS_UTrack_V003 Canyon Flyin' Blues By: Killer Fish (Todd Showalter) of Late Nite Software Labs -------------------------------- Written on or about Aug/93. (c) This is my first experience with Ultra Tracker, and I like it. It could really use a JUMP effect, though... This song was based on an old idea I had for a song, years ago. I hope you enjoy the song as much as I enjoyed composing it. Greetz, in no particular or definite order, go to: Captain/Image C.C.Catch Ryan Cramer Deathjester Nuke Romeo Knight Lizardking Purple Motion I love the music you guys have written. Demos come and go, but a good tune can stand the test of time. I've heard 4 track MODfiles that blow the hell out of most popular music on the market these days, and the artists above are probably THE best in the tracker-composing field, and are using 8 to 32 tracks. I've just run out of writing space (32 lines). Adieu... Killer Fish
